pages.text: This rocket will start the rain when it explodes in the sky.$(br2)The more Ghast Tears are added to the rocket the longer the rain duration.$(br2)Dispensers can be used to automate this rocket.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Craft one $(l:firework_rocket)Firework Rocket$(/l) along with Ghast Tears to get a Rain Rocket.$(br2)You can also use a existing Rain Rocket and add more Ghast Tears to it.$(br2)The recipe is shapeless.
